post.body: sounds like he's taping a scene for "when pizza deliveries go wrong". Give that dude some space.
that looks damn tasty. Order two.
def reinvent.
no need for :( it was :) or rather :D
you sound just like a school teacher on the 1st day of class with that one. big up though nicks
nah. rlslog.net or iwillsearch4u.com will prob have the r5 soon, but it's still pretty new. i'll keep an eye out, though.
slumdog millionaire is dope!!!
punching flowers and stealing souls. same ole same ery sunday, fam. whaddup in your whirl?
don't worry, child. just put on your parka, duck boots and grab some hot tea. will put a smile pon dem gyal's face, seen?
don't skimp on the white sauce. you'll be sorry.
i used to get jay hawk and howlin wolf mixed up all the time as a kid. jay had that smoking skull cane, though. too hard.
it's been in my netflix queue for years...heard it was nice...just haven't gotten around to it. you win this round.
yep. bought it during my asian invasion phase. it's dope...so is Old Boy.
come on down....it's like mister roger's neighborhood with a small amount of gun play.
he's milking'em while he can. running backs don't last long. arthritis...lapd...something's bound to happen.
I'm letting a friend redecorate the bachelor pad, but she's hanging too much estrogen on the walls. Decisions, decisions.
Queens get the money!!!
Me head still hurts
i'm a blues man @ heart. down-in-the-delta blues man.
Newsflash: clowns still "make it rain" in the club. WTF
movie recap: slumdog (yes), frost/nixon (yes), synecdoche ny (yes), day earth stood still (NO), quantum solace (no), boy in striped PJs (?)
it's almost 11 and i'm oven-frying chick breasts using planko crumbs. feeling real bobby flay right now.
counting pennies to see if i can get a motorcycle AND a macbook for xmas. i don't wanna knock over some old woman for munny, but i'll do it.
aceyalone's "makeba" record still rolls
these dudes are silly: http://tinyurl.com/5mbxqf
my girl rocks!!!
slumdog soundtrack is aight so far.
Go see Slumdog. Dope flick!!!
seeing seven pounds reminded me of this nick drake track: http://tinyurl.com/6tseul feels like a sunrise - like dionne farris's hopeless.
who else digs the "nightmare before xcmas" flick? it's super macabre, but really just a love story.
i've slept all durn day. being a xmas bum is not so kewl when the fam is expecting shopping time.
dam i miss nyc. been fiending for some halal chicken and rice. used to hit up this spot on the regular: http://www.53rdand6th.com/
i reupped my crown joules comp...real hip-hoppers have some: http://sharebee.com/70fdf61d
the new batman is supposed to be tough and all that, but that suckas name is still bat man....not intimidating at all.
aight. time to boot up the workstation and frankenstein some sounds together. gonna be an all-nighter, so i'll twit in a bit. stay close.
Texting like Will in 7lbs is not so smark. I'm an idiot at times.
And it's 66 degrees out here. The top is down at 3 in the morn.
Atlanta is too spreadout. Gonna take an hour to get home.
The appetizer... http://snipurl.com/8xxqt
"hey hey hey heeeeyyyyyyy...don't say you will. unless you will." - kw
